statements: DELETE FROM credit_and_loan_management WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM credit_and_loan_management WHERE customer_id = 101 AND credit_score > 700;
DELETE FROM credit_and_loan_management WHERE credit_score < 500 OR loan_eligibility = TRUE;
DELETE FROM credit_and_loan_management WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND loan_eligibility = FALSE;
DELETE FROM CreditScores WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%'
DELETE FROM LoanEligibility WHERE is_eligible = false;
DELETE FROM credit_scores WHERE user_id = 100 AND credit_score < 600;
DELETE FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'rejected';
DELETE FROM loan_eligibility WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM loan_applications);
